When to praise? when to scold? How many action points to use?
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 4 Archive (PS2): Miscellaneous Q&A (Post New Questions Here) : When to praise? when to scold? How many action points to use?
By chibikin on Thursday, September 15, 2005 - 08:01 pm:

I am having the hardest time raising my monsters, cus their stats just stop rising by the end of their lives. I think that my problem is that I usually try to use up all the action points every week, running around praising for nothing, and then they get very spoiled. So my question is:

When should I praise or when should I scold? I heard it depends on the percentage of success rate - but what above what % should I praise and below what % should I scold? Also, do ppl normally use up all the action points every week? Or they only use it to do necessary things?

Your reply would be appreciated

By Petit-Trot on Friday, September 16, 2005 - 09:16 am:

Praise only when you want to reduce stress in a hard trainning routine. Working a monster hard will stress it, but will also discipline it, so praising it will relieve a bit of stress while not spoiling it.

By Petit-Trot on Friday, September 16, 2005 - 09:21 am:

And I do only what's necessary, there's no point in wasting money and time.

By Queeny on Friday, September 30, 2005 - 05:48 pm:

I praise my monster when it's trained 90% or over and scold it when it's trained 65% or under.

By Volafor on Friday, May 25, 2007 - 04:12 pm:

I praise above 85%. If a monster trains at 95% or above, I reward it with a well-liked toy. If the monster earns 100%, I reward with its very favorite toy.
Once the monster starts on gadgets, I scold below 80% with the Wind Drum, or below 75% without the Drum.

By Salokin on Tuesday, August 7, 2007 - 12:26 pm:

I praise when above 85% and scold when below 70% doing so has kept my monsters training in the 90%. If they had won a match and get a 90% or above the next week I give them their favorite toy. Also people that I had heard from scolded them when the lost because of bullishness or timidity.

By Zilk the Rank S Master on Tuesday, June 23, 2009 - 09:48 am:

i scold when my monsters get less then 85% so they normaly get 92-96%.
